abiDocs.name: convertCountryIndexToBytes

outputs.name: countries1
outputs.description: First third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint

outputs.name: countries2
outputs.description: Second third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint

outputs.name: countries3
outputs.description: Third third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint

abiDocs.details: Expects a list of country indexes such that the 2 digit country code is converted to an  index. Countries are expected to be indexed so a "AA" country code is mapped to index 0 and  "ZZ" country is mapped to index 675.
abiDocs.return: { "countries1" : "First third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint", "countries2" : "Second third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint", "countries3" : "Third third of the byte array converted in a 256 bytes uint" }
abiDocs.notice: Converts country index list into 3 uints
